skins.shipDescription: Kongou-class fast battleship number four C Haruna.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Haruna, the Sakura Empire's speediest fast battleship. I fought hard till the very end. Once more, I will fight with all my heart, holding nothing back!
skins.acquisition: Hello. I'm the Sakura Empire's latest fast battleship, Haruna. I prefer to use my fists over my blade, but I hope that won't be an issue.
skins.login: Nice weather today. We should head out so we don't miss our chance to enjoy it. Don't you agree, Commander?
skins.details: I wish I was as popular as Kirishima... Well, kind of...
skins.secretaryIdle1: At last... At long last, I will have my battle with Wales...!
skins.secretaryIdle2: When you've got bravery and willpower, no enemy is insurmountable. Isn't that right, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Joushuu beef is some of the best around. Care to try some?
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you like Hiei's handmade sweets, too?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hah!!!... I'll keep my gloves on next time so I can strike you without getting my hands dirty.

skins.shipDescription: I think it's fine to enjoy school life once in a while... Hm? You wanna know what I'm listening to? Sure, if you're okay with just one earbud.
skins.acquisition: I think it's fine to enjoy school life once in a while... Hm? You wanna know what I'm listening to? Sure, if you're okay with just one earbud.
skins.details: I think people will gawk at us if Kirishima and I walk around looking like this... *Sigh*... It's tough being popular...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I think I prefer working up a sweat in the sports field over reading in the classroom.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Gotta join a club... There's the karate club... Maybe that'll work?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm free all week after school. Why don't we hang out a bit, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: I always look forward to the lunch box Hiei makes for me every day.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... Do you want me to beat you over the head with my bag?

skins.shipDescription: I guess that looks right... Since Kongou chose this for me, I must trust her judgment... Um, C-Commander, would you mind helping me out? ...It's a bit hard to walk in this outfit...
"My dear Commander, is this dress that my sisters tailored for me to your liking?" ...Okay, no, I can't do polite Hiei-speak like she can... So, anyway, h-how do I look?
skins.acquisition: "My dear Commander, is this dress that my sisters tailored for me to your liking?" ...Okay, no, I can't do polite Hiei-speak like she can... So, anyway, h-how do I look?
skins.login: Commander, you should get to work before Kongou gets mad at you.
skins.details: I knew this kimono looked good, but your approval is what really sealed the deal, Commander. It might not be the best kimono ever, but I'll gladly take a better-than-passing grade from you!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Getting dressed was easier than you might think, because I practiced it! See, you start from the bottom and... Oh geez!
skins.secretaryIdle2: When I say I'll do something, I'll do it right! I'll prove that even I can conduct myself elegantly, as one of Kongou's sisters!
skins.secretaryTouch: Watch this, I've got a stylish move for you!
